config:
checkpoint_config = dict(interval=1)
log_config = dict(interval=5, hooks=[dict(type='TextLoggerHook')])

load_from = None
resume_from = None

        index_file='/home/dq/gitlab/datasets/table/test_data/list_d.txt',

        index_file='/home/dq/gitlab/datasets/table/test_data/list_d.txt',
        transform=False))
